question.body: Which of the following is not a function of the integumentary system?

response.feedback: Incorrect. The skin is the first line of defense because it forms a barrior of entry for pathogens.
Correct. The skin makes vitamin D not vitamin A.
Incorrect. The skin is very important in controlling body temperature, we sweat to cool our body.
Incorrect. The skin does excrete some wastes such as urea in our sweat.
